spells.name: Acid Splash
spells.desc: 1 or 2 creatures within 5 feet must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d6 acid damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Aid
spells.desc: Up to 3 creatures increase their hp maximum and current hp by 5 (+5 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Alarm
spells.desc: Alert the caster or activate an alarm if a Tiny or larger creature enters a warded 20 ft cube.

spells.name: Alter Self
spells.desc: Give a new form depending on the chosen option (Aquatic Adaptation, Change Appearance, or Natural Weapons).

spells.name: Animal Friendship
spells.desc: A beast with Intelligence 3 or less must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed (+1 beast/lvl).

spells.name: Animal Messenger
spells.desc: A Tiny beast travels to deliver a 25 words message to a target (+48 h/lvl).

spells.name: Animal Shapes
spells.desc: Willing targets within 30 ft turn into beasts of FP 4 or lower.

spells.name: Animate Dead
spells.desc: Create a skeleton from bones or a zombie from a corpse, who is under the caster control (+2 creatures/lvl).

spells.name: Animate Objects
spells.desc: Animate up to 10 non magic objects and control their actions up to 500 ft (+2 items/lvl).

spells.name: Antilife Shell
spells.desc: Prevent creatures other than undead and constructs from entering in a 10 ft radius.

spells.name: Antimagic Field
spells.desc: Create a 10 ft radius sphere in which spells and magic items no longer work.

spells.name: Antipathy
spells.desc: Attract or repel (Wis. save in order to not be attracted or scared) a kind of creature designated within 60 ft.

spells.name: Arcane Eye
spells.desc: Create an invisible eye with darkvision that sends the caster the mental image of what it sees.

spells.name: Arcane Gate
spells.desc: Create 2 portals (max 500 ft between them) and allow teleport from one to the other.

spells.name: Arcane Lock
spells.desc: Lock an objet (door, window, chest, etc) and the caster can set a password to suppresses the spell for 1 minute.

spells.name: Armor of Agathys
spells.desc: The caster gains 5 temporary hp and creatures who hits him with a melee attack take 5 cold damage (+5 hp and damage/lvl).

spells.name: Arms of Hadar
spells.desc: Creatures in a 10 ft radius must succeed on a Str. save or take 2d6 necrotic damage (damage/lvl)

spells.name: Astral Projection
spells.desc: The caster and up to 8 creatures are projected into the Astral Plane.

spells.name: Augury
spells.desc: The caster obtains an omen about the result of an action within the next 30 min (weal, woe, both or nothing).

spells.name: Aura of Life
spells.desc: Creatures in a 30 ft radius gain resistance to necrotic damage and regain 1 hp when at 0 hp.

spells.name: Aura of Purity
spells.desc: Creatures in a 30 ft radius can not become diseased, gain resistance to poison, and get advantage to various saving throws.

spells.name: Aura of Vitality
spells.desc: One target in a 30 ft radius regains 2d6 hp.

spells.name: Awaken
spells.desc: Give a beast or plant (Intelligence 3 or less) the ability to speek and senses similar to a human's for 30 days.

spells.name: Bane
spells.desc: Up to 3 targets must succeed on a Cha. save or subtract 1d4 from their attack roll or saving throw (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Banishing Smite
spells.desc: If the weapon attack hits, deal an extra 5d10 force damage. Target reduced to 50 hp or fewer this way are banised.

spells.name: Banishment
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Cha. save or be banished to a harmless demiplane (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Barkskin
spells.desc: The target's AC can't be less than 16.

spells.name: Beacon of Hope
spells.desc: Targets gain advantage on Wis. saving throws and death saving throws, and regain the maximum number of hp from healing.

spells.name: Beast Sense
spells.desc: The caster can see/hear/feel through the senses of a willing beast.

spells.name: Bestow Curse
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or suffer an effect as a disadvantage to a check or lose an action (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Bigby
spells.desc: Create a Large hand with a Strength of 26 that can strike (4d8 force damage), push, grapple, or protect (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Blade Barrier
spells.desc: Create a 100 x 20 x 5 ft wall that provides three quarters cover and can inflict 6d10 slashing damage if passed through.

spells.name: Blade Ward
spells.desc: The caster gets resistance against bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage dealt by weapon attacks.

spells.name: Bless
spells.desc: Up to 3 targets can add 1d4 to their attack roll or saving throw (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Blight
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 8d8 necrotic damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Blinding Smite
spells.desc: If the attack hits, deals an extra 3d8 radiant damage and the target must succeed on a Con. save or be blinded.

spells.name: Blindness
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Con. save or become blinded or deafened (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Blink
spells.desc: The caster has 50% of chance to switch to the Ethereal Plane, then returns to the space he vanished from on the next turn.

spells.name: Blur
spells.desc: The caster's body becomes blurred and creatures that attack him have disadvantage on attack rolls against him.

spells.name: Branding Smite
spells.desc: If a weapon attack hits, deals an extra 2d6 radiant damage and the target sheds dim light in 5 ft radius (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Burning Hands
spells.desc: Creatures in a 15 ft cone must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d6 fire damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Call Lightning
spells.desc: Creatures in a 5 ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d10 lightning damage (damage/lvl) on each turn.

spells.name: Calm Emotions
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 foot radius sphere must succeed on a Cha. save or no longer be charmed/frightened, or be indifferents.

spells.name: Chain Lightning
spells.desc: Up to 4 different targets must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d8 lightning damage (+1 target/lvl).

spells.name: Charm Person
spells.desc: The humanoid target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed by the caster (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Chill Touch
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8 necrotic damage (damage/lvl) and the target can't regain hp immediately.

spells.name: Chromatic Orb
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 3d8 damage of a previously determined type (damage/lvl)

spells.name: Circle of Death
spells.desc: Creatures in a 60 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 8d6 necrotic damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Circle of Power
spells.desc: Friendly creatures in a 30 ft radius have advantage on saving throws against spells and other magicial effects.

spells.name: Clairvoyance
spells.desc: Create an invisible sensor in a familiar location within 1 mile, allowing to see or to hear (to choose, can switch).

spells.name: Clone
spells.desc: Create in 120 days the inert double of a living creature. If the original creature dies, its soul is transferred to the clone.

spells.name: Cloud of Daggers
spells.desc: Creatures in a 5 ft cube take automatically 4d4 slashing damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Cloudkill
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 5d8 poison damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Color Spray
spells.desc: 6d10 creatures hp are dazzled in ascending order of their current hp (+2d10 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Command
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or follow your order as Approach, Drop, Flee, Fall, Halt, etc (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Commune
spells.desc: Allow to obtain from a divine entity the answers (yes or no) to 3 questions.

spells.name: Commune with Nature
spells.desc: The caster gets 3 informations about the surrounding territory. Doesn't function in dungeons or towns.

spells.name: Compelled Duel
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or get a disadvantage on attack rolls against creatures other than the caster.

spells.name: Comprehend Languages
spells.desc: The caster understands any spoken and written (1 min/page) language. Doesn't decode secret messages.

spells.name: Compulsion
spells.desc: Targets within 30 ft must succeed on a Wis. save or move in a specified direction.

spells.name: Cone of Cold
spells.desc: Creatures in a 60 ft cone must succeed on a Con. save or take 8d8 cold damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Confusion
spells.desc: Creatures in a 10 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Wis. save or can't take actions normally (+ 5 ft radius/lvl).

spells.name: Conjure Animals
spells.desc: Summon from 1 beast of CR 2 to 8 beasts of CR 1/4, friendly (nbr of creatures/lvl).

spells.name: Conjure Barrage
spells.desc: Creatures in a 60 ft cone must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d8 damage from the weapon/ammunition used.

spells.name: Conjure Celestial
spells.desc: Summon 1 celestial of CR 4, friendly (CR +1/lvl).

spells.name: Conjure Elemental
spells.desc: Summon 1 elemental of CR 5, friendly (CR +1/lvl).

spells.name: Conjure Fey
spells.desc: Summon 1 fey of CR 6, friendly (CR +1/lvl).

spells.name: Conjure Minor Elementals
spells.desc: Summon from 1 elemental of CR 2 to 8 elemental of CR 1/4, friendly (nbr of creatures/lvl).

spells.name: Conjure Volley
spells.desc: Creatures in a 40 ft radius, 20 ft high cylinder must succeed on a Dex. save or take 8d8 damage from the weapon/ammunition used.

spells.name: Conjure Woodland Beings
spells.desc: Summon from 1 fey of CR 2 to 8 fey of CR 1/4, friendly (nbr of creatures/lvl).

spells.name: Contact Other Plane
spells.desc: Contact an extraplanar entity to ask it 5 questions if an Int. save is successful. Otherwise, 6d6 psychic damage.

spells.name: Contagion
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, target is afflicted with a disease to choose from 6 proposed.

spells.name: Contingency
spells.desc: Condition the activation of a 5th level spell or lower that can target the caster.

spells.name: Continual Flame
spells.desc: Create a flame that produces a light equivalent in brightness to a torch, but does not emit any heat.

spells.name: Control Water
spells.desc: Control the water in a 100 ft cube (cause a flood, part the water, redirect the flow, create a whirlpool).

spells.name: Control Weather
spells.desc: Modify gradually the climatic conditions outdoors (precipitation, temperature and wind force).

spells.name: Cordon of Arrows
spells.desc: 4 ammunition deal 1d6 piercing damage if the target doesn't succeed on a Dex. save (nbr of ammunition/lvl).

spells.name: Counterspell
spells.desc: In reaction, fail a spell of 3rd level or lower. Ability check if the spell is 4th level or higher (threshold/lvl).

spells.name: Create Food and Water
spells.desc: Create 45 pounds of food and 30 gallons of water, enough to sustain 15 humanoids for 24 hours.

spells.name: Create or Destroy Water
spells.desc: Create or destroy up to 10 gallons of water (+10 gallons/lvl).

spells.name: Create Undead
spells.desc: Up to 3 Medium or Small humanoids corpses become a ghoul who obey the caster for 24 h (nbr and type of creatures/lvl).

spells.name: Creation
spells.desc: Create a non living object made of vegetable matter or mineral and no larger than a 5 ft cube (+5 ft/lvl).

spells.name: Crown of Madness
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed. It then can attack a target designated by the caster.

spells.name: Crusader
spells.desc: Friendly creatures in a 30 ft radius deal an extra 1d4 radiant damage when they hit with a weapon attack.

spells.name: Cure Wounds
spells.desc: 1 creature regains 1d8+Ability.Mod (+1d8 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Dancing Lights
spells.desc: Create up to 4 torch sized lights that shed dim light in a 10 ft radius and can be moved later up to 60 ft.

spells.name: Darkness
spells.desc: Fill a 15 ft radius sphere of magical darkness.

spells.name: Darkvision
spells.desc: The target can see in the dark within 60 feet.

spells.name: Daylight
spells.desc: Create a sphere that sheds bright light in a 60 ft radius and dim light in an additional 60 ft radius.

spells.name: Death Ward
spells.desc: When the target drops to 0 hp for the first time, it automatically returns to 1 hp.

spells.name: Delayed Blast Fireball
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 12d6 fire damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Demiplane
spells.desc: Create a door that leads to a demiplane (30 ft cube). Creatures still in the demiplane at the end of the spell are trapped.

spells.name: Destructive Wave
spells.desc: Targets in a 30 ft radius must succeed on a Con. save or take 5d6 thunder damage and 5d6 radiant or necrotic damage.

spells.name: Detect Evil and Good
spells.desc: The caster senses and locates aberration, celestial, elemental, fey, fiend, or undead within 30 ft.

spells.name: Detect Magic
spells.desc: The caster senses the presence of magic in a 30 ft radius and learns its school of magic.

spells.name: Detect Poison and Disease
spells.desc: The caster senses and identifies poison, poisonous creature, or disease within 30 ft.

spells.name: Detect Thoughts
spells.desc: The caster detects the superficial thoughts of a creature within 30 ft, and the deepest if the target misses a Wis. save.

spells.name: Dimension Door
spells.desc: The caster and another creature of the same size are teleported to a maximum of 500 feet.

spells.name: Disguise Self
spells.desc: Modify the appearance of the caster (its physical and its equipment) thanks to an illusion.

spells.name: Disintegrate
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d6+40 force damage (damage/lvl). An Large or smaller object is disintegrated.

spells.name: Dispel Evil and Good
spells.desc: End a condition (charmed, frightened, or possessed) or bannish a creature to its home plane (Cha. save).

spells.name: Dispel Magic
spells.desc: End spells of 3rd level 3 or lower on a target. Ability check for each spell of 4th level or higher (threshold/lvl).

spells.name: Dissonant Whispers
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or take 3d6 psychic damage and move away (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Divination
spells.desc: The caster gets a truthful reply to 1 question about an event to occur within 7 days.

spells.name: Divine Favor
spells.desc: If a weapon attack hits, deals an extra 1d4 radiant damage.

spells.name: Divine Word
spells.desc: Targets must succeed on a Cha. save or suffer an effect (deafened, blinded, etc). Some creatures are banned.

spells.name: Dominate Beast
spells.desc: A beast within 60 ft must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and obey the launcher (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Dominate Monster
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and obey the caster (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Dominate Person
spells.desc: One humanoid must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and obey the caster (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Drawmij
spells.desc: Mark a 10 pounds or less object and allow to teleport it into the caster hand, wherever it is, if not held.

spells.name: Dream
spells.desc: Shape the dreams of a sleeping creature who can take 3d6 psychic damage if it fails on a Wis. save.

spells.name: Druidcraft
spells.desc: Provide various minor effects related to nature (weather forecast, flowering, sensory effect, etc).

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.desc: Creatures in a 100 ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or be knocked prone. Cause damage to structures.

spells.name: Eldritch Blast
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 1d10 force damage (nbr of beam/lvl).

spells.name: Elemental Weapon
spells.desc: A weapon becomes magical with a +1 bonus to attack rolls and deal an extra 1d4 damage of a chosen type (bonus/lvl).

spells.name: Enhance Ability
spells.desc: The target gains advantage on ability checks for one predefined ability, and other bonuses in such cases (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Enlarge
spells.desc: Double or halve the size of a creature (Con. save) or an object.

spells.name: Ensnaring Strike
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Str. save or be restrained and take 1d6 piercing damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Entangle
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft square (difficult terrain) must succeed on a Str. save or be restrained.

spells.name: Enthrall
spells.desc: Targets must succeed on a Wis. save or have disadvantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks to perceive others creatures.

spells.name: Etherealness
spells.desc: The caster is projected into the Ethereal Plane (nbr of creatures/lvl).

spells.name: Evard
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft square must succeed on a Dex. save or take 3d6 bludgeoning damage and be restrained.

spells.name: Expeditious Retreat
spells.desc: The caster can take the Dash action by using a bonus action.

spells.name: Eyebite
spells.desc: The target in a 60 ft radius must succeed on a Wis. save or take on a the following effects: asleep, panicked or sickened.

spells.name: Fabricate
spells.desc: Convert raw materials into Large or smaller simples objects of the same material.

spells.name: Faerie Fire
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft cube must succeed on a Dex. save or grant advantage against them to attackers.

spells.name: False Life
spells.desc: The caster gains 1d4+4 temporary hit points (+5 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Fear
spells.desc: Creatures in a 30 ft cone must succeed on a Wis. save or drop whatever they are holding, become frightened and move away.

spells.name: Feather Fall
spells.desc: Up to 5 creatures fall at 60 feet per round and take no falling damage before the spell ends.

spells.name: Feeblemind
spells.desc: The target take 4d6 psychic damage and must succeed on an Int. save or his Charisma and Intelligence scores become 1.

spells.name: Feign Death
spells.desc: The willing target appears dead to all outward inspection.

spells.name: Find Familiar
spells.desc: Summon a small animal that obeys the caster and telepathically shares his senses with him.

spells.name: Find Steed
spells.desc: Summon a spirit that assumes the form a steed (horse, elk, etc) telepathically linked to the caster.

spells.name: Find the Path
spells.desc: Determine the shortest and most direct physical path to reach a known destination.

spells.name: Find Traps
spells.desc: The caster senses the presence of any trap in a 120 fr radius, but the spell don't give their location.

spells.name: Finger of Death
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 7d8+30 necrotic damage. If killed, becomes a zombie under the caster command.

spells.name: Fire Bolt
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 1d10 fire damage (damage/lvl). An object can ignite.

spells.name: Fire Shield
spells.desc: The caster gains resistance to cold or fire damage, and deals 2d8 damage to attackers who hit him within 5 ft.

spells.name: Fire Storm
spells.desc: Creatures in ten 10 ft cube must succeed on a Dex. save or take 7d10 fire damage.

spells.name: Fireball
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or take 8d6 fire damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Flame Blade
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 3d6 fire damage (damage/lvl). Shed bright light in 10 ft and dim light in additional 10 ft.

spells.name: Flame Strike
spells.desc: Creatures in a 10 ft radius, 40 ft high cylinder must succeed on a Dex. save or take 4d6 fire and 4d6 radiant (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Flaming Sphere
spells.desc: Creatures within 5 ft from a 5 ft diameter sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d6 fire damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Flesh to Stone
spells.desc: The target within 60 ft must succeed on a Con. save or be restrained, or petrified after 3 failures.

spells.name: Fly
spells.desc: The target gets a flying speed of 60 ft (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Fog Cloud
spells.desc: Makes an area heavily obscured in a 20 ft radius sphere (+20 ft/lvl).

spells.name: Forbiddance
spells.desc: Prevent teleporting to the protected area and inflicts 5d10 radiant or necrotic damage to some type of creatures.

spells.name: Forcecage
spells.desc: Creates a 20 ft cage or a 10 ft box of magical force that traps a creature. Escape by magicial means only.

spells.name: Foresight
spells.desc: 1 creature sees its near future, can not be surprised and has advantage on his rolls. Attacks against it have disadvantage.

spells.name: Freedom of Movement
spells.desc: Target's movement is unaffected by difficult terrain, spells or water.

spells.name: Friends
spells.desc: The casters gets advantage on all Charisma checks directed at one chosen creature that isn't hostile toward him.

spells.name: Gaseous Form
spells.desc: The target turns into a cloud, gets a flying speed of 10 ft, and can pass through small holes.

spells.name: Gate
spells.desc: Create a portal to another plan. Also allows to summon a creature from another plane.

spells.name: Geas
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and take 5d10 psychic if it doesn't obey (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Gentle Repose
spells.desc: Protect a corpse from decay or to become undead.

spells.name: Giant Insect
spells.desc: Transform insects (from 10 centipedes to 1 scorpion) into giant creatures that obey the caster's orders.

spells.name: Glibness
spells.desc: Give 15 to a Charisma check and hides the lies during a magic detection.

spells.name: Globe of Invulnerability
spells.desc: Block 5th level spells or lower within a 10 ft radius (threshold/lvl).

spells.name: Glyph of Warding
spells.desc: A glyph on an object deals 5d8 damage in a 20 ft radius (damage/lvl) or casts a 3rd level spell (lvl/lvl) when triggered.

spells.name: Goodberry
spells.desc: Create up to 10 berries that restore 1 hp each and keep their power for 24 hours.

spells.name: Grasping Vine
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Dex. save or be pulled 20 ft toward the vine.

spells.name: Grease
spells.desc: Creatures in a 10 ft square (difficult terrain) must succeed on a Dex. save or fall prone.

spells.name: Greater Invisibility
spells.desc: The target becomes invisible for 1 minute.

spells.name: Greater Restoration
spells.desc: End one condition (charmed or petrified), one curse, any ability scores or hp reduction, or one exhaustion level.

spells.name: Guardian of Faith
spells.desc: Hostiles creatures within a 10 ft radius of the created guardian must succeed on a Dex. save or take 20 radiant damage.

spells.name: Guards and Wards
spells.desc: Create a ward that protect a 50 ft square. Can set a password to immunize individuals.

spells.name: Guidance
spells.desc: The target can add 1d4 to one ability check of its choice.

spells.name: Guiding Bolt
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 4d6 radiant damage (damage/lvl) and the next attack roll will have advantage.

spells.name: Gust of Wind
spells.desc: Creatures on a 60 ft long, 10 ft wide line mus succeed on a Str. save or be pushed 15 ft away.

spells.name: Hail of Thorns
spells.desc: Creatures in a 5 ft radius must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d10 piercing damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Hallow
spells.desc: Prevent celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead to enter a 60 ft radius area and protect/handicap the targets.

spells.name: Hallucinatory Terrain
spells.desc: Make a natural terrain looks like another type (for example a road becomes a swamp or a crevasse).

spells.name: Harm
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 14d6 necrotic damage. The spell can't kill it however.

spells.name: Haste
spells.desc: Target's speed is doubled. It also gains a +2 bonus to AC, advantage to Dex. saves and 1 additional action.

spells.name: Heal
spells.desc: 1 creature regains 70 hp and are cured of diseases, blindness, and deafness (+10 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Healing Word
spells.desc: 1 creature regains 1d4+Ability.Mod (+1d4 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Heat Metal
spells.desc: Creatures in physical contact with the metal object take 2d8 fire damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Hellish Rebuke
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d10 fire damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Heroes
spells.desc: Produce a feast for 12 guests that cures diseases, immunizes to poison and increases hp by 2d10 for 24 hours.

spells.name: Heroism
spells.desc: The target is immune to being frightened and gains temporary hp equal to its Ability.Mod each turns (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Hex
spells.desc: If an attack hits, deals an extra 1d6 necrotic damage. Disadvantage on achosem ability check (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Hold Monster
spells.desc: Target must succeed on a Wis. save or be paralyzed (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Hold Person
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be paralyzed (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Holy Aura
spells.desc: Targets in a 30 ft radius have advantage on saving throws. Other creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls against them.

spells.name: Hunger of Hadar
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius sphere take 2d6 cold damage et must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d6 acid damage.

spells.name: Hunter
spells.desc: The target take an extra 1d6 damage and caster has advantage on Wisdom (Perception/Survival) checks to find it (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Hypnotic Pattern
spells.desc: Creatures in a 30 ft cube must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and incapacitated, with a speed of 0.

spells.name: Ice Storm
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius, 40 ft high cylinder must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d8 bludgeoning damage and 4d6 cold damage.

spells.name: Identify
spells.desc: The caster obtains properties of a magic item (attunement, charges) or knows if an item or a creature is affected by a spell.

spells.name: Illusory Script
spells.desc: Write a secret message that can only be read by a designated target or a creature with truesight.

spells.name: Imprisonment
spells.desc: The target within 30 ft must succeed on a Wis. save or be held prisoner. The form is to choose from 6 options.

spells.name: Incendiary Cloud
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d8 fire damage.

spells.name: Inflict Wounds
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 3d10 necrotic damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Insect Plague
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 4d10 piercing damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Invisibility
spells.desc: The target becomes invisible during 1 hour or until she attacks or casts a spell (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Jump
spells.desc: The target gets a jump distance multiplicated by 3.

spells.name: Knock
spells.desc: Unlock or unbar 1 object (door, chest, padlock, set of manacles, etc) or suppressed the arcane lock spell for 10 minutes.

spells.name: Legend Lore
spells.desc: The caster obtains information about a person, place, or object. The lore consist of tales or stories.

spells.name: Leomund
spells.desc: Hide a chest (3 x 2 x 2 ft) and its contents in the Ethereal Plane.

spells.name: Leomund
spells.desc: Create a 10 ft radius dome that can shelter and protect 9 Medium creatures with the caster.

spells.name: Lesser Restoration
spells.desc: End one disease or one condition (blinded, deafened, paralyzed, or poisoned) on 1 creature.

spells.name: Levitate
spells.desc: 1 creature or object that weighs up to 500 pounds rises vertically up to 20 ft then remains suspended.

spells.name: Light
spells.desc: Make an object to shed bright light in a 20 ft radius and dim light in an additional 20 ft radius.

spells.name: Lightning Arrow
spells.desc: If the attack hits, deals 4d8 Iightning damage. Creatures within 10 ft must succeed on a Dex. save or take 2d8 lightning damage.

spells.name: Lightning Bolt
spells.desc: Creatures on a 100 ft long, 5 ft wide line must succeed on a Dex. save or take 8d6 lightning damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Locate Animals or Plants
spells.desc: Give the direction and distance to a kind of beast or plant within 5 miles.

spells.name: Locate Creature
spells.desc: The caster senses the direction in which a familiar creature is within a 1000 ft radius.

spells.name: Locate Object
spells.desc: The caster senses the direction to the location of an objet you are familiar with, within a 1000 ft radius.

spells.name: Longstrider
spells.desc: The target gets a speed increased by 10 ft (+1 creature/lvl).

spells.name: Mage Armor
spells.desc: The target, willing and not wearing armor, gets an AC equal to 13+Dex.Mod.

spells.name: Mage Hand
spells.desc: Create a spectral hand that can in a 30 ft radius manipulate an object, open a door, stow an item, etc.

spells.name: Magic Circle
spells.desc: Create a 10 ft radius, 20 ft tall cylinder that protect from celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and/or undead (+1 h/lvl).

spells.name: Magic Jar
spells.desc: The caster projects his soul into an urn and then returns to his body or possesses a humanoid body.

spells.name: Magic Missile
spells.desc: 3 missiles deal automatically 1d4+1 force damage each to one or several creatures (+1 missile/lvl).

spells.name: Magic Mouth
spells.desc: Creates a magical mouth that will repeat a message of up to 25 words when a trigger condition is met.

spells.name: Magic Weapon
spells.desc: Turn a weapon into a +1 magic weapon for attack rolls and damage rolls (+2 or +3 bonus/lvl).

spells.name: Major Image
spells.desc: Create the image of an animated object or creature, with sounds and smells (without concentration/lvl).

spells.name: Mass Cure Wounds
spells.desc: Up to 6 creatures regain 3d8+Spell.Ability.Mod (+1d8 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Mass Heal
spells.desc: Several creatures regain a total of 700 ph and are cured of diseases, blindness, and deafness.

spells.name: Mass Healing Word
spells.desc: Up to 6 creatures regain 1d4+Ability.Mod (+1d4 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Mass Suggestion
spells.desc: Up to 12 targets must succeed on a Wis. save or follow the suggestion given by the caster (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Maze
spells.desc: Banish a creature into a labyrinthine demiplane. Intelligence check to escape before the end of the spell.

spells.name: Meld into Stone
spells.desc: The caster can penetrate the stone.

spells.name: Melf
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 4d4 acid damage, then 2d4 acid damage on the next round (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Mending
spells.desc: Repair break or tear in an object (broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, torn cloak, leaking wineskin, etc).

spells.name: Message
spells.desc: The caster whispers a message to a creature within 120 ft who will be the only one to hear it. It can reply the same way.

spells.name: Meteor Swarm
spells.desc: Creatures in a 40 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Dex. save or take 20d6 fire damage and 20d6 bludgeoning damage.

spells.name: Mind Blank
spells.desc: The target is immune to psychic damage, reading thoughts, divination spells, and the charmed condition.

spells.name: Minor Illusion
spells.desc: Create a sound or an immobile image of an object no larger than a 5 ft cube.

spells.name: Mirage Arcane
spells.desc: Tansform the appearance (sight, sound, smell and feel) of a 1 mile square.

spells.name: Mirror Image
spells.desc: Create 3 illusory duplicates of the caster, each of them having a CA equal to 10 + Dex.Mod and being destroyed if they are hit.

spells.name: Mislead
spells.desc: The caster becomes invisible and creates a double that moves, acts and speaks. The caster can see and hear through this double.

spells.name: Misty Step
spells.desc: The caster is teleported up to 30 feet.

spells.name: Modify Memory
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be charmed and its memory altered (seniority of memories/lvl).

spells.name: Moonbeam
spells.desc: Creatures in a 5 ft radius, 40 ft high cylinder must succeed on a Con. save or take 2d10 radiant damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Mordenkainen
spells.desc: Summon an invisible watchdog that barks when a creature approaches and attacks it (4d8 piercing damage).

spells.name: Mordenkainen
spells.desc: Create an extradimensional mansion with all the comforts that can shelter the caster and other creatures.

spells.name: Mordenkainen
spells.desc: Create a secure cube up to 100 ft on each side. The type of protection is to choose (+100 ft on each side/lvl).

spells.name: Mordenkainen
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 3d10 force damage. The sword can move.

spells.name: Move Earth
spells.desc: Shape dirt, sand, or clay, but not stone (raise, lower, flatten, create a trench, etc) in a 40 ft square in 10 min.

spells.name: Nondetection
spells.desc: Protect a creature or an object from any divination magic or magical scrying.

spells.name: Nystul
spells.desc: Reveal false information about a creature or an object that would be the target of a divination spell.

spells.name: Otiluke
spells.desc: Creatures in a 60 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 10d6 cold damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Otiluke
spells.desc: The Large size or smaller target must succeedd on a Dex. save or be enclosed for the spell duration.

spells.name: Otto
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or dance (disadvantage on Dex. save and attack rolls).

spells.name: Pass without Trace
spells.desc: The caster and his allies within 30 ft get a +10 bonus to Dexterity (Discretion) checks and leave behind no tracks or traces.

spells.name: Passwall
spells.desc: Open a 5 ft wide, 8 ft tall, 20 ft deep passage through stone, wood or plaster.

spells.name: Phantasmal Force
spells.desc: Tha target must succeed on an Int. save or perceive as real an object or creature created by the caster (with sound).

spells.name: Phantasmal Killer
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or be frightened then take 4d10 psychic damage (damage/lvl) on each of it's turn.

spells.name: Phantom Steed
spells.desc: Create a quasi real Large horselike creature and everything to mount it.

spells.name: Planar Ally
spells.desc: Summon a celestial, elemental, or fiend that will help the caster in exchange for payment (1000 gp/h, sacrifice, quest, etc).

spells.name: Planar Binding
spells.desc: The target (celestial, elemental, fey, or fiend) must succeed on a Cha. save or serve the caster (duration/lvl).

spells.name: Plane Shift
spells.desc: The caster and up to 8 creatures are transported to another plane of existence, or a creature is banished (Cha. save).

spells.name: Plant Growth
spells.desc: Plants in the area grow vigorously, or over a year the plants produce twice the normal amount of food.

spells.name: Poison Spray
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Con. save or take 1d12 poison damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Polymorph
spells.desc: Transform a target into a new beast form whose CR/level is equal to or less than the target's CR/level.

spells.name: Power Word Heal
spells.desc: The target regains all its hp and charmed, frightened, paralyzed, and stunned conditions end.

spells.name: Power Word Kill
spells.desc: The target (100 hp or fewer) dies!

spells.name: Power Word Stun
spells.desc: The target (150 hp or fewer) is stunned until it succeeds on a Con. save.

spells.name: Prayer of Healing
spells.desc: Up to 6 creatures regain 2d8+Ability.Mod (+1d8 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Prestidigitation
spells.desc: Minor magical trick (sensory effect, light a torch, clean an object, warm, make a symbol appear, create a trinket, etc).

spells.name: Prismatic Spray
spells.desc: Creatures in a 60 ft cone must succeed on a Dex. save or take 10d6 damage of a randomly determined type.

spells.name: Prismatic Wall
spells.desc: Create a multi layered wall that inflicts different effects and damage depending on the layer.

spells.name: Produce Flame
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8 fire damage (damage/lvl). Shed bright light in 10 ft and dim light in additional 10 ft.

spells.name: Programmed Illusion
spells.desc: Create the image of an animated object or creature, with sounds, for 5 min, with a triggering condition.

spells.name: Project Image
spells.desc: Create a copy of the caster that mimics him, moves and emits sounds. The caster can see and hear through this double.

spells.name: Protection from Energy
spells.desc: The target gains resistance to one damage type (acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder).

spells.name: Protection from Evil and Good
spells.desc: The target is protected (disadvantage on attack rolls) against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.

spells.name: Protection from Poison
spells.desc: Neutralize 1 poison in one creature, give advantage on saving throws againt being poisoned, and resistance to poison damage.

spells.name: Purify Food and Drink
spells.desc: Purified and rendered free of poison and disease nonmagical food and drink in a 5 ft radius sphere.

spells.name: Raise Dead
spells.desc: Take back to life (1 hp) a creature died for no longer than 10 days. Doesn't restore missing body parts.

spells.name: Rary
spells.desc: Create a telepathic link between up to 8 people in a 30 ft radius for 1 hour.

spells.name: Ray of Enfeeblement
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, the target deals only half damage with a weapon attack that use Strength (Con. save).

spells.name: Ray of Frost
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8 cold damage (damage/lvl) and the target's speed is reduced by 10 ft.

spells.name: Ray of Sickness
spells.desc: If the attack hits, deals 2d8 poison damage (damage/lvl) and the target can be poisoned (Con. save).

spells.name: Regenerate
spells.desc: The target regains 4d8+15 hp then 1 hp per round and its severed members are restored.

spells.name: Reincarnate
spells.desc: Reincarnate the soul of an humanoid died for no longer than 10 days. The race of the new body is determined at random.

spells.name: Remove Curse
spells.desc: End all curses affecting one creature or object.

spells.name: Resistance
spells.desc: The target can add 1d4 to one saving throw of its choice.

spells.name: Resurrection
spells.desc: Take back to life (all hp) a creature died for no longer than 100 years (except of old age). Restore any missing body parts.

spells.name: Reverse Gravity
spells.desc: Invert gravity in a 50 ft radius, 100 ft high cylinder.

spells.name: Revivify
spells.desc: Take back to 1 hp a creature that has died within the last minute (except of old age).

spells.name: Rope Trick
spells.desc: Vertically raise a rope that lead to an extradimensional space that can hold 8 Medium creatures.

spells.name: Sacred Flame
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Dex. save or take 1d8 radiant damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Sanctuary
spells.desc: The protected creature forces a Wis. save to his aggressor in case of attack or offensive spell to no longer be the target.

spells.name: Scorching Ray
spells.desc: If the spell attacks hit, 3 rays deal 2d6 fire damage each (+1 ray/lvl).

spells.name: Scrying
spells.desc: Allow you to see and hear a specific creature (can also target a location) on the same plane (Wis. save).

spells.name: Searing Smite
spells.desc: If the attack hits, deals an extra 1d6 fire damage and ignite the target (damage/lvl).

spells.name: See Invisibility
spells.desc: The caster sees invisible creatures and objects, and into the Ethereal Plane.

spells.name: Seeming
spells.desc: Change physical appearance as well as clothing and equipment of targets (saving throw for unwilling).

spells.name: Sending
spells.desc: Send a 25 words message to a creature you are familiar with, regardless of the distance or the plan. It can answer it.

spells.name: Sequester
spells.desc: Protect a willing creature (who becomes invisible and unconscious) or an object from divination spells.

spells.name: Shapechange
spells.desc: The caster takes the form of a creature he has seen at least once with a CR equal to its level or lower.

spells.name: Shatter
spells.desc: Creatures in a 10 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or take 3d8 thunder damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Shield
spells.desc: In reaction, the caster gains a +5 bonus to AC and take no damage from the magic missile spell.

spells.name: Shield of Faith
spells.desc: The target gets a +2 bonus to AC.

spells.name: Shillelagh
spells.desc: Make magical a wooden weapon. Its damage become a d8 and the caster can use his spellcasting ability instead of Strength.

spells.name: Shocking Grasp
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8 lightning damage (damage/lvl) and the target can't take reactions.

spells.name: Silence
spells.desc: Block all sounds within a 20 ft radius sphere.

spells.name: Silent Image
spells.desc: Create the image of an object or a creature (without sound and no larger than a 15 ft cube) and lets it move.

spells.name: Simulacrum
spells.desc: Create a duplicate of a beast or humanoid with the same abilities, half of the hp and without equipment.

spells.name: Sleep
spells.desc: 5d8 hp of creatures fall unconscious, starting with the creature with the lowest current hp (+2d8 hp/lvl).

spells.name: Sleet Storm
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius, 20 ft tall cylinder (heavily obscured) must succeed on a Dex. save or fall prone.

spells.name: Slow
spells.des: Up to 6 targets must succeed on a Wis. save, or have their speed and actions reduced and -2 to CA and Dex. saves.

spells.name: Spare the Dying
spells.desc: 1 living creature with 0 hit points becomes stable.

spells.name: Speak with Animals
spells.desc: The caster communicates with beats that can share information or help.

spells.name: Speak with Dead
spells.desc: Allow a corpse that still has a mouth and is not an undead to answer 5 questions to the caster.

spells.name: Speak with Plants
spells.desc: The caster can communicate with plants within 30 ft, and turns difficult terrain into ordinary terrain or vice versa.

spells.name: Spider Climb
spells.desc: The target can move along vertical surfaces while leaving its hands free and gains climbing speed.

spells.name: Spike Growth
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius (difficult terrain) take 2d4 piercing damage for every 5 ft of movement.

spells.name: Spirit Guardians
spells.desc: Targets in a 15 ft radius must succeed on a Wis. save or take 3d8 radiant or necrotic damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Spiritual Weapon
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 1d8+Ability.Mod force damage (damage/lvl). A bonus action allows another attack.

spells.name: Staggering Smite
spells.desc: If the attack hits, deals an extra 4d6 pyschic damage and the target must succeed on a Wis. save or have a disadvantage.

spells.name: Stinking Cloud
spells.desc: Creatures in a 20 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Con. save or spend their action that turn retching and reeling.

spells.name: Stone Shape
spells.desc: Give a stone no more than 5 ft in any dimension any shape, or create an opening in it.

spells.name: Stoneskin
spells.desc: The target gets resistance to nonmagical bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing damage.

spells.name: Storm of Vengeance
spells.desc: Creatures in a 360 ft radius must succeed on a Con. save or be deafened and suffer various damage and effects.

spells.name: Suggestion
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or follow the suggestion given by the caster in one or two sentences.

spells.name: Sunbeam
spells.desc: Creatures on a 5 ft wide, 60 ft long line must succeed on a Con. save or take 6d8 radiant damage and be blinded.

spells.name: Sunburst
spells.desc: Creatures in a 60 ft radius must succeed on a Con. save or take 12d6 radiant damage and be blinded for 1 min.

spells.name: Swift Quiver
spells.desc: Make a quiver to produce an endless supply of nonmagical ammunition, allowing 2 attacks per round with a bonus action.

spells.name: Symbol
spells.desc: Set the trigger and the effect of a glyph on an object (death, discord, fear, hopelessness, insanity, pain, sleep, etc).

spells.name: Tasha
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or falls into fits of laughter, fall prone and becoming incapacitated.

spells.name: Telekinesis
spells.desc: Move a creature (Huge or smaller) or object (up to 1,000 pounds) by thought in case of successful contest.

spells.name: Telepathy
spells.desc: Comunicate via telepathy with a known and willing creature on the same plane of existence.

spells.name: Teleport
spells.desc: The caster and 8 creatures are teleported anywhere on the same plane. Risk of failure depending on the destination familiarity.

spells.name: Teleportation Circle
spells.desc: Create a circle that allows anyone to be teleported to another teleportation circle known to the caster.

spells.name: Tenser
spells.desc: Create a floating 3 ft diameter disk that can support up to 500 pounds and follows the caster.

spells.name: Thaumaturgy
spells.desc: Create various minor effects to impress or distract creatures.

spells.name: Thorn Whip
spells.desc: If the attack hits, deals 1d6 piercing damage and pull the target (Larger or smaller) up to 10 ft (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Thunderous Smite
spells.desc: If the attack hits, deals an extra 2d6 thunder damage, and target must succeed on a Str. save or be pushed and knocked prone.

spells.name: Thunderwave
spells.desc: Creatures in a 15 ft cube must succeed on a Con. save or take 2d8 thunder damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Time Stop
spells.desc: Stop the time during 1d4+1 turns for everyone except for the caster.

spells.name: Tongues
spells.desc: The target understands and speaks any spoken language it hears.

spells.name: Transport via Plants
spells.desc: The caster can move from one plant to another plant (Large or larger) using 5 ft.

spells.name: Tree Stride
spells.desc: The caster can move from one tree to another tree of the same kind (500 ft max between both) using 5 ft.

spells.name: True Polymorph
spells.desc: Transform a creature or object into a new form (creature < > object) of FP/level at most equal to the FP/level of the crea

spells.name: True Resurrection
spells.desc: Take back to life (all hp) a creature died for no longer than 200 years (except of old age), even without the original body.

spells.name: True Seeing
spells.desc: The target gets truesight, sees magic secret doors and in the Ethereal Plane.

spells.name: True Strike
spells.desc: The caster gains advantage on his first attack roll against a target.

spells.name: Tsunami
spells.desc: Creatures in a 300 ft long, 300 ft high, 50 ft thick area must succeed on a Str. save or take 6d10 bludgeoning damage.

spells.name: Unseen Servant
spells.desc: Create an invisible servant who performs simple tasks (bring something back, clean up, maintain a fire, serve at table, etc).

spells.name: Vampiric Touch
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 3d6 necrotic damage (damage/lvl) and the caster regains 50% of his hp.

spells.name: Vicious Mockery
spells.desc: The target must succeed on a Wis. save or take 1d4 psychic damage and have disadvantage on its attack roll (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Wall of Fire
spells.desc: Create a 60 x 20 x 1 ft wall of fire. Creatures inside or within 10ft of one side of the wall take 5d8 fire damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Wall of Force
spells.desc: Create a physically insurmountable wall of force (ten 10 ft panels) immune to all types of damage.

spells.name: Wall of Ice
spells.desc: Create a wall of ice (ten 10 ft panels) that can be damaged and can inflict 5d6 cold damage if passed through (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Wall of Stone
spells.desc: Create a nonmagical wall of stone (ten 10 ft panels) that can be damaged.

spells.name: Wall of Thorns
spells.desc: Create an 60 ft long, 10 ft high, 5 ft thick wall of brush that slows movement and can inflict 7d8 piercing damage (damage/lvl).

spells.name: Warding Bond
spells.desc: The target gains +1 on AC, +1 on saving throws and resistance to all damage, but the caster shares damage.

spells.name: Water Breathing
spells.desc: Up to 10 creatures gets the ability to breathe underwater.

spells.name: Water Walk
spells.desc: Up to 10 creatures can move on a liquid surface (water, acid, mud, lava, etc) as if it were harmless solid ground.

spells.name: Web
spells.desc: Create a 20 ft cube filled by thick, sticky webs (difficult terrain) that can restrain creature (Dex. save).

spells.name: Weird
spells.desc: Creatures in a 30 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Wis. save or be frightened and take 4d10 psychic damage each turn.

spells.name: Wind Walk
spells.desc: The caster and up to 10 creatures assume gaseous form (flying speed of 300 ft and resistance to damage from nonmagical weapon).

spells.name: Wind Wall
spells.desc: Create a 50 ft long, 15 ft high, 1 ft thick wall of wind. Small flying creatures can't pass. Arrows and bolts are deflected.

spells.name: Wish
spells.desc: Duplicate a 8th level spell or lower without components, or create another effect at the MD discretion.

spells.name: Witch Bolt
spells.desc: If the spell attack hits, deals 1d12 lightning damage (damage/lvl) on each round.

spells.name: Word of Recall
spells.desc: The caster and up to 5 other creatures are teleported to a previously designated sanctuary.

spells.name: Wrathful Smite
spells.desc: If the attack hits, deals an extra 1d6 psychic damage and the target must succeed on a Wis. save or be frightened.

spells.name: Zone of Truth
spells.desc: Creatures within a 15 ft radius sphere must succeed on a Cha. save or can not lie.
